meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: AT&T Shares Plunge 14% AT&T warned that earnings and revenue growth for the year would be lower than expected. Even as it met targets for the quarter, shares plunged 14 percent. PAGE C1
AT&T Shares Plunge 14% AT&T warned that earnings and revenue growth for the year would be lower than expected. Even as it met targets for the quarter, shares plunged 14 percent. PAGE C1
Albany Accord on Borrowing Governor Pataki and legislative leaders agreed to restrict the state's borrowing practices, paving the way for adoption of a budget. PAGE B1
Democrats Win in Nassau Democrats regained control of the Nassau County Legislature in a special election to fill the seat of a lawmaker who died. PAGE B1
Publisher Is Replaced The publisher of The San Francisco Examiner was replaced after saying he offered Mayor Willie Brown favorable editorials in return for support of a business deal. PAGE A20
Top Runner Gets Citizenship Khalid Khannouchi, the Moroccan-born marathoner, can run for the United States, but may be unable to qualify for the Olympics. PAGE D5
Imperial Relics Sold A Qing vase sold at a Hong Kong auction for $2.7 million was among four plundered treasures bought and repatriated by Chinese
